DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim of this study is to examine the relationship between personal values and suicidal thoughts in a sample of U.S. Veterans.
DOC.brief_title: Personal Values, Interpersonal Needs, and Suicidal Ideation in a Veteran Population
DOC.criteria: Currently receiving care through the Denver VA Medical Center Behavioral Health Interdisciplinary Team Over the age of 18 Willing to travel to the Denver VAMC to complete assessment measures. Provide informed consent to participate Inability to adequately respond to questions regarding the informed consent procedure
